Title: Formalities
Plot: Grissom is called to a murder of a 17-year-old in a casino penthouse. Sophia Curtis (Louise Lombard) joins him in his research, she normally works in the day-shift. The entire team gets involved when its discovered that a kiddnapping took place along with the murder.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Seth Gabel, Xander Berkeley, Jonathan Banks, Mike Erwin, Matthew Carey, Kate Mara, Adrianne Palicki, Kevin Cooney, Eric Lange, Jon Tenney, Danica Stewart
